title: Strengthening Programming Competencies: Collaborative Learning Strategy Design in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners achieve 80% or higher proficiency by applying self-regulated learning (SRL) strategies in blended learning environments.
Maintain at least three weekly interactions with peer learners through collaborative task performance.
Achieve 90% or higher participation in learning activities (assignments, discussion engagement, etc.) via digital platforms.
Maintain emotional engagement (self-reported) at 4 points or higher on a 5-point scale during the learning process.
Achieve a 20% or higher improvement rate in learning outcomes through feedback implementation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
